Unitron:




Unitron easily ducked out of the way of the incoming missile and resisted the 
urge to fire on the distracted Megatron impostor and claim victory, but pure 
Decepticon honor that he had lived by for millions upon millions of years 
kept him from acting upon his thoughts.

Instead he turned his intention to the two intruders.  He raised his rifle, 
firing off three laser blasts from it at the annoying Firestrike, a quick 
five rapid optic blasts shooting out at Nightfire.
